mapper.select: SELECT * FROM room WHERE store_id=#{storeId} AND status = '모집중'

SELECT r.id, r.store_id, r.room_name, r.room_address, r.max_people, COUNT(rj.id) AS joinCount FROM room r LEFT JOIN room_join rj ON r.id = rj.room_id WHERE r.status = '모집중' GROUP BY r.id, r.store_id, r.room_name, r.room_address, r.max_people

SELECT r.id, r.store_id, r.room_name, r.room_address, r.max_people, r.status, r.created_at, r.room_address_detail, NVL(COUNT(rj.id), 0) AS join_count FROM room r LEFT JOIN room_join rj ON r.id = rj.room_id AND rj.status = '참여중' WHERE r.status = '모집중' GROUP BY r.id, r.store_id, r.room_name, r.room_address, r.max_people, r.status, r.created_at, r.room_address_detail ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room ( store_id, room_name, room_address, max_people, users, leader_id, status, room_address_detail, created_at ) VALUES ( #{storeId}, #{roomName}, #{roomAddress}, #{maxPeople}, #{users}, #{leaderId}, #{status}, #{roomAddressDetail}, SYSDATE )
